entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Westlock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:48 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14.
